adrFormatAddress: 2440 Broadway #275, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text: Fantastic teacher and amazing school! Mark Stolzenberg took me from an amateur actress to working and learning in film in just 6 months! He also helped me with audition prep, which resulted in an acceptance and scholarship to a top acting conservatory. Whether you‚Äôre serious about acting as a career, or you just want to broaden your horizons, I would recommend this school and instructor to anyone.

originalText.text:
I think that my experience would have been a better one if I had a different acting teacher at the time in the early 2000s. My teacher was Mr. Angel David and he wasn't a very nice person at all as I remembered...

Response from the owner 11 hours ago
The individual has never attending the school. There is no record of attendance. There is a high likelihood that she is shilling for a competitor.

Not "shilling for a competitor." My review was honest and sincere. I simply had the wrong school. My apologies.

originalText.text:
The school definitely helped me to expand my range as an actor. Now I am comfortable to be vulnerable on camera.  I am much more confident in my delivery now. I can do drama and comedy with no problem ü•≥ü•≥ü•≥‚ú®Ô∏èüé¨üéûüìΩüí™‚ù§Ô∏è I also learned a lot about the difference between the reality of the movie and our reality when you are acting. Especially when you are on a close up.
Commercial classes helped me personally to become more believable  when I promoting something.
Last, but not the least, everyone is friendly and no one is judging you.  Very helpful! Thank you guys! Much love! Keep shining!

originalText.text: I‚Äôve been working with Mark for over a year and he‚Äôs a great teacher and his live classes are a fun experience for everybody thanks to him. Happy to have attended!

text.text: I‚Äôve been working with Mark for over a year and he‚Äôs a great teacher and his live classes are a fun experience for everybody thanks to him. Happy to have attended!

originalText.text: If you're looking to make acting your profession, look no further. Mark and Karen are the best in the game when it comes to teaching acting. I have become a better actor than I could possibly hope to come thanks to this acting school. Mark truly knows how the professional acting industry works and he will make sure that you are prepared for the real thing! I would not be where I am today if it weren't for my time here at this school. Not to mention I made some amazing friends here and this school as a whole has changed my life!
